Please describe what you liked or disliked about this product and whether you recommend it to others. Please remember to be polite and follow the Rules and Guidelines. A description is required to post your recommendation

Świetna gierka. Portal ² jest znacznie dłuższy od jedynki, kampanię przyjemnie się przechodzi, są zwroty akcji, fajne postacie :D, sporo humoru i wspaniały klimat. Jest trochę nowych elementów gameplayowych jak np.żele. Oprócz tego świetny tryb współpracy, świetnie zrobiony, pozwala się cieszyć grą nawet po przejściu kampanii. Pod koniec fabuły, tak jak w jedynce jest fajna pioseneczka :). Od strony technicznej bardzo dobrze, świetna oprawa graficzna, zero bugów i crashy, bardzo dobra fizyka. Ścieżka dźwiękowa również świetna, zarówno ta z kampani jak i co-opa.
Лучшая игра в жанре головоломок, в разы лучше предыдущий части.
oyun çok güzel ve sarıyor aldığıma pişman değilim ve zaten tüm arkadaşlarıma da öneriyorum
Игра с интересным сюжетом единственное почему я купил игру а не скачал пиратку это редактор уровней и кооператив а так советую купил 2 людям

Great game. single player is amazing with a great story, fun yet challenging puzzles, cool gameplay, and funny diolague. Co op is the same but with friends! Me and my friends have a blast playing this game for speedruns or just a game to play one weekend. Portal 1 and 2 are both great games and would definitely recommend them!

Creo que este juego no necesita una introducción.

Un juegazo de aca a Pando,tremenda historia,tremendos personajes y tremendos puzzles.

El modo coop esta muy bueno,la verdad te cagas de risa con un amigo obvio jugar con un random la verdad no se como es nunca lo probe y no tengo intenciones de probarlo XDDDDDDDDDDDD.

COMPRALO PAPIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIITOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

Genuinely perfect.

I can not personally recommend it enough, if you enjoy puzzle games and still have not played Portal 2 then you are truly missing out on a great, one of a kind experience.
11/10 My #1 favourite game.

I'm currently on my second playthrough of this game. I'm not as obsessed with it as some people were at the height of Portal's popularity, but it is a pretty great game. The puzzles support the story well, and most of them are pretty manageable even without help.

This game is full of stuff it is amazing
I love playing this with my 9 Y/O, its fun, non-violent and makes her think. I only wish they would release a portal 3!
I love the all the puzzles with portals.!!!!
Obra prima dos puzzles que influenciou uma porrada de jogos do gênero. Joguei maior parte do tempo o modo cooperativo com um amigo e rendeu ótimas horas de diversão e uma gostosa dor de cabeça.
what can I say ... must play.

This game is excellent! The graphics are great, the story is good, and you can even create your own levels! Sadly, after completing the story, I sort of drifted away from the game. But it is definitely worth playing!
